active_incidents.title: Some customers are unable to receive 2FA SMS messages

notes.body:
We're still investigating issues with 2FA SMS messages.

In the meantime, while we recognize these aren't ideal solutions, as a workaround you can use a backup code or reach out to a Workspace Owner or Admin to disable 2FA for your account. They'll be able to do so from the Members page: https://my.slack.com/admin

Some customers are unable to receive 2FA (two-factor authentication) SMS messages. This is due to an issue experienced by one of our upstream partners. We are investigating further and will share back when we have more updates.
